1: מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>O</n> יִתֶּנְךָ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>O that</n> כְּאָ֣ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>thou [wert] as my brother</n> לִ֔י יוֹנֵ֖ק <sup>3243 </sup> <n>that sucked</n> שְׁדֵ֣י <sup>7699 </sup> <n>the breasts</n> אִמִּ֑י <sup>517 </sup> <n>of my mother</n> אֶֽמְצָאֲךָ֤ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>[when] I should find</n> בַחוּץ֙ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>thee without</n> אֶשָּׁ֣קְךָ֔ <sup>5401 </sup> <n>I would kiss</n> גַּ֖ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>either</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יָב֥וּזוּ <sup>936 </sup> <n>thee yea I should not be despised</n> לִֽי׃

5: מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> זֹ֗את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> עֹלָה֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Who [is] this that cometh up</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>from the wilderness</n> מִתְרַפֶּ֖קֶת <sup>7514 </sup> <n>leaning</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> דּוֹדָ֑הּ <sup>1730 </sup> <n>beloved</n> תַּ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> הַתַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <sup>8598 </sup> <n>thee up under the apple tree</n> עֽוֹרַרְתִּ֔יךָ <sup>5782 </sup> <n>awakened</n> שָׁ֚מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> חִבְּלַ֣תְךָ <sup>2254 </sup> <n>brought thee forth</n> אִמֶּ֔ךָ <sup>517 </sup> <n>there thy mother</n> שָׁ֖מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>There</n> חִבְּלָ֥ה <sup>2254 </sup> <n>there she brought thee forth</n> יְלָדַֽתְךָ׃ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>[that] bare</n>
